Rules.ErrorMessage: WARNING: 121 - VT PUMP Manual Pick Required for 50 Hz {0} HP {1} pump!
WARNING: 121 - VT PUMP Manual Pick Required for {0} HP {1} pump!
Rules.Expression: ProductFamily.PumpConfigurations.Any(r => r.PumpDescription == "Water Feature" || r.PumpDescription == "Transfer") && Flag1 == false
